Package com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.core.engine

Interface WSWRLRuleEngine

All Superinterfaces:
org.swrlapi.core.SWRLRuleEngine
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultWSWRLRuleEngine
public interface WSWRLRuleEngine extends org.swrlapi.core.SWRLRuleEngine
This interface provides must that must be implemented be a WSWRL Rule engine. It is inspired from SWRLRuleEngine. Some methods would be added in the futur.

    infer()

  • Method Details

    • infer

      void infer() throws WSWRLRuleEngineException
      Load rules and knowledge from the ontology, send them to the rule engine, run the rule engine, and write any inferred knowledge back to the ontology.
      Specified by:
      infer in interface org.swrlapi.core.SWRLRuleEngine
      Throws:
      org.swrlapi.exceptions.SWRLRuleEngineException - If an error occurs during inference.
      WSWRLRuleEngineException
